samples.name: Dynamic Page FIORI 2.0 List Report floor plan
samples.description: The Dynamic Page is a FIORI 2.0 generation layout control. The sample shows how the List Report floor plan can be implemented.

samples.name: Dynamic Page FIORI 2.0 Analytical Table floor plan
samples.description: The Dynamic Page is a FIORI 2.0 generation layout control. The sample shows how the AnalyticalTable works inside it.

samples.name: Flexible Column Layout basic sample
samples.description: This sample demonstrates a Flexible Column Layout aggregating three pages. Additionally the option to switch between the two different types of three-column layout is enabled. To observe how the control behaves on Desktop, it is recommended to view the sample in Fullscreen mode.

samples.name: Flexible Column Layout with Dynamic Pages
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to configure a Flexible Column Layout with three Dynamic Page instances, and additionally add a Fullscreen button to the page in the rightmost visible column. To observe how the control behaves on Desktop, it is recommended to view the sample in Fullscreen mode.
